metadata.title: CVE-2019-20919 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the DBI module before 1.643 for Perl. Thehv_fetch() documentation requires checking for NULL and the code does that.But, shortly thereafter, it calls SvOK(profile), causing a NULL pointerdereference.

criterions.comment: libdbi-perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
